t: Amazon Clinic - Wikipedia
s: January 4, 2025 - Amazon Clinic was an Amazon subsidiary that provided virtual healthcare services, until being merged with the company's in-person healthcare subsidiary One Medical. Launched in November 2022, it is available to persons aged 18 to 64, in all 50 states and Washington, DC.

t: Should You Use Amazon Clinic?

t: What Amazon Clinic Will Mean for Consumers and the Online Retail Giant | AHA
s: Amazon has launched Amazon Clinic, a virtual message-based service that connects consumers with third-party telehealth providers (including ones from SteadyMD and HealthTap) for diagnosis and treatment of 20 common health conditions including allergies, acne and hair loss.

t: Amazon's 'affordable' health care service has a hidden cost: your privacy : NPR

s: March 14, 2024 - Amazon is focusing most of its healthcare efforts on what it knows best: the consumer. Amazon Clinic is a healthcare play that meshes well with the core strengths of the retail giant.
